vkick.notVC: :rolling_eyes: -  **The member is not connected to a voice channel!**

kick.invalidMember: Please mention a valid member or provide a valid member ID.
kick.kickError: :rolling_eyes: - I couldn't kick that user. Please double-check my permissions.

clear.noMessages: No messages found matching the filters.

setcolor.invalid_input: :rolling_eyes: - Hex color length must equal 6 or 3
setcolor.error: :rolling_eyes: -  I couldn't change that role. Please double-check my permissions and role position.

slowMode.max_time_exceeded: :x: Time should be less than or equal to **6 hours**.
slowMode.invalid: :stopwatch: This channel's Slowmode has been disabled.
slowMode.success: :stopwatch: This channel slowmode has been set to **{seconds} seconds**.

moveme.userNotInVoice: {target} is not in a voice channel.

disabled.module: :x: The module of the command is not enabled
disabled.channel: :x: This command is not enabled on
disabled.role: :x: You are not allowed to use this command.
disabled.serverOnly: :x: Slash commands only work on servers

credits.lessMoney: ** :thinking: | zampx, Your balance is not enough for that!**

setLang: :white_check_mark: The Language has been changed successfully

fields.name: :closed_lock_with_key:  Roles ({roleCount})
fields.value: To see a list with all roles use **/roles**

roll: :rolling_eyes: - "{option}" is not a valid input string for #roll.

lock.lockError: There was an error trying to lock the channel.
lock.invalidChannel: Please specify a valid channel to lock.

setnick.noPermission: :rolling_eyes: - I couldn't update that user. Please double-check my permissions and role position.
setnick.nickError: There was an error changing the nickname. Please try again later.

timeout.max: :x: Timeout duration must be lower or equal to 28 days.
timeout.notTimedOut: :x: The member is not timed out.
timeout.invalidDuration: **:rolling_eyes: - The time limit must be equal to one of the following: (m, h, d, w, mo, y)**
timeout.timeoutError: :rolling_eyes: - I couldn't timeout that user. Please double-check my permissions and role position.
timeout.untimeoutError: :rolling_eyes: - I couldn't untimeout that user. Please double-check my permissions and role position.

rolekick.kickError: :x: There was an error kicking members with the role.
rolekick.roleNotFound: The specified role was not found.
rolekick.noMembers: No members found with the specified role.
rolekick.ownerOnly: This command can only be executed by the server owner.
